body_html: As a related point, when calling backward on a Module with an explicit gradient, the current API accepts a Tensor rather than a Variable for the upstream gradient; autowrapping Tensors in the forward pass would make the forward and backward APIs more consistent.
body_text: As a related point, when calling backward on a Module with an explicit gradient, the current API accepts a Tensor rather than a Variable for the upstream gradient; autowrapping Tensors in the forward pass would make the forward and backward APIs more consistent.
body: As a related point, when calling backward on a Module with an explicit gradient, the current API accepts a Tensor rather than a Variable for the upstream gradient; autowrapping Tensors in the forward pass would make the forward and backward APIs more consistent.
